Printer Setup Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Linux)

Select File»Print Window to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to send a print job to the printer.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Pages—Determines which pages to print.
    • All—Prints every page.
    • From—Specifies a range of pages to print.
  • Print—Sends the job to the printer.
